channel.title: Is there any program to watch satalite tv on the computer or just normal cableTV
channel.description: If any one has the program can u send the site for me

item.title: Is there any program to watch satalite tv on the computer or just normal cableTV
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Lol, my grandpa hooked up his satellite box to his computer monitor (and it’s like jumbo size that would cost like 1.5K $$$). Lol, we have Directv, with Tvo (or however it’s spelled).
Tvo: Can record, rewind, fastforward, pause, play tv.

So I guess you can hook up your satellite to your monitor, if you have the right equipment.

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any program to watch satalite tv on the computer or just normal cableTV
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

Hahaha, anyone else find it humorous that SETO posted a “goodbye interent I’m too busy for you throughout the summer” thread the same day as a “how can I watch satellite tv on my computer” thread?

I personally would use my spare time using a computer and learning something rather than watching tv on it. If you only have a little bit of time, drop the tv. =P

Read full topic

item.title: Is there any program to watch satalite tv on the computer or just normal cableTV
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

FYI, if your watching streaming TV, your gonna need a pretty good internet connection.

There are a lot of websites that stream tv stations. I can’t think of any, but try searching gooel for something like Fox TV streamer, or something.

item.title: Is there any program to watch satalite tv on the computer or just normal cableTV
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

Super Internet TV allows you to watch 800+ live television channels and listen to 1000+ online radio stations from 100+ countries. There is no need for a TV Tuner card because all the channels are streamed through your Internet connection. For most TV and Radio channels a modem speed of 56Kb/s is required, for the broadband TV stations you need 300 Kb/s. This software comes with automatic TV station updates so it will never be out of date. If you are interested in learning languages or alternative programming, this is a good choice for you.

Message Protection:

Program
Download:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=F8RI4U32

crack:
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=549HFJ1C

Is this what you want?

Read full topic
